title: Implement /ssdf-env-audit command
description:
Audit development and deployment environment security - infrastructure, access controls, network segmentation.

**SSDF Coverage**: PO.5.1, PO.5.2

title: Implement /ssdf-continuous-monitoring command
description:
Configure continuous security monitoring - file watches, git hooks, CI/CD integration.

**SSDF Coverage**: All practices (continuous enforcement)

title: Implement /ssdf-threat-model-evolution command
description:
Track threat model evolution over time - changes, new threats, mitigation updates.

**SSDF Coverage**: PW.1 (enhanced)

title: Implement /ssdf-architecture-review command
description:
Review software architecture for security - design patterns, attack surface, trust boundaries.

**SSDF Coverage**: PW.2.1

title: SSDF Integration: Core orchestration skill
description: Create ssdf-secure-development skill that proactively enforces SSDF practices. Triggers on: new features (threat modeling), code changes (secure coding), pre-commit (security review), dependency changes (third-party verification). Dispatches sub-agents as needed.

title: Implement /ssdf-coding-standards command
description:
Validate code against secure coding standards - OWASP, CERT, language-specific guidelines.

**SSDF Coverage**: PW.5.1, PW.5.2

title: SSDF Integration: RV practice skills
description: Create skills for Respond to Vulnerabilities: RV.1 identify vulnerabilities (error-detective agent), RV.2 assess/remediate, RV.3 root cause analysis (debugger agent). Track vulnerabilities via Beads issues.

title: SSDF Integration: PS practice skills
description: Create skills for Protect Software practices: PS.1 code protection, PS.2 release integrity verification, PS.3 archive/SBOM. Dispatch dependency-manager agent for SBOM generation.

title: Implement /ssdf-toolchain-audit command
description:
Audit development toolchain for security - compilers, package managers, build tools, IDE plugins.

**SSDF Coverage**: PO.3.1, PO.3.2

title: Implement /ssdf-policy-as-code command
description:
Define security policies as code - declarative rules, enforcement levels, exception management.

**SSDF Coverage**: PO.1.1, PO.1.2

title: SSDF Automation Enhancement Epic
description:
Comprehensive automation enhancements to expand SSDF compliance coverage. Covers 15 automation opportunities across all 4 SSDF practice groups (PO, PS, PW, RV).

**Completed (Phase 1):**
- /ssdf-integrity-check (PS.1, PS.2)
- /ssdf-sbom-generate (PS.3.2)
- /ssdf-secure-defaults (PW.9)
- /ssdf-build-hardening (PW.6)

**Remaining:**
- Phase 2: Toolchain Audit, Coding Standards, Metrics, Vuln Patterns
- Phase 3: Env Audit, Architecture Review, Continuous Monitoring, Policy as Code
- Phase 4: Threat Model Evolution, Training Gaps, SLSA Provenance
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] All 15 automation features implemented
- [ ] Evidence generation for all SSDF practice groups
- [ ] Documentation complete

title: Implement /ssdf-vuln-patterns command
description:
Analyze vulnerability patterns to identify recurring issues and root causes.

**SSDF Coverage**: RV.3.3, RV.3.4

title: Implement /ssdf-slsa-provenance command
description:
Generate and verify SLSA supply chain provenance attestations.

**SSDF Coverage**: PS.3.1, PS.3.2, EO14028 4e(vi)

title: SSDF Integration: Project-local configuration structure
description: Create .claude/ssdf/ with ssdf-config.yaml, evidence/, templates/ directories. Config should specify enabled practices, project requirements, and evidence output settings.

title: SSDF Integration: PO practice skills
description: Create skills for Prepare Organization practices: PO.1 security requirements, PO.2 roles/responsibilities, PO.3 toolchains, PO.4 security checks criteria, PO.5 secure environments.

title: Implement /ssdf-training-gaps command
description:
Identify security training gaps based on vulnerability patterns and code issues.

**SSDF Coverage**: PO.2.2 (enhanced)

title: SSDF Integration: Evidence generation
description: Create evidence export capability: markdown reports per practice area, on-demand JSON/YAML structured evidence for audits. technical-writer agent for formatting. Output to .claude/ssdf/evidence/.

title: SSDF Integration: Slash commands
description: Create on-demand commands: /ssdf-threat-model, /ssdf-security-review, /ssdf-dependency-check, /ssdf-vuln-assess, /ssdf-evidence-export, /ssdf-compliance-report. Commands dispatch to skills and generate artifacts.

title: SSDF Integration: PW practice skills
description: Create skills for Produce Well-Secured Software: PW.1 threat modeling (security-auditor agent), PW.4 third-party verification (dependency-manager agent), PW.5 secure coding (code-reviewer agent), PW.7 code review, PW.8 security testing (penetration-tester agent), PW.9 secure defaults.

title: Implement /ssdf-metrics command
description:
Generate security metrics dashboard - vulnerability trends, compliance scores, coverage stats.

**SSDF Coverage**: PO.4.1, PO.4.2
